weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level1_des: Increase shatter by 15% and restore 10% of HP after shattering the target's shield.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level3_1_des: Gain an Ice Shield equal to 10% of Max HP for 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level3_des: Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to 10% of Max HP. Cooldown: 20 seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level5_des: Increase damage and shatter by 50% while the shield is active.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level6_1_des: Gain an Ice Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_Level6_des: Upon switching to the weapon, gain an Ice Shield equal to 20% of Max HP and immunity to being controlled when shield is active. Cooldown: 20 seconds. The Ice Shield lasts up to 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level0_1_des: Gain a frost shield equal to 10% of the Wanderer's Max HP for 10 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level0_des: Switching to this weapon grants a shield equal to 10% of Max HP that lasts up to 10 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level1_des: When equipped with 2 or more defense-type weapons, reduce damage received by 5%. Take effect immediately and stack with multiple weapons. Effect and aggro are both increased when playing in a team.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level2_1_des: Upon switching to the weapon, gain a Frost Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10 seconds and immunity to hitstun. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level2_des: Upon switching to the weapon, gain a Frost Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10 seconds and immunity to hitstun. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level4_1_des: Upon switching to the weapon, gain a Frost Shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 10 seconds and immunity to hitstun and control. Also, increase final damage by 30%. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level4_des: Grant immunity to control effects and increase final damage by 30% while shield is active.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level5_1_des: Increase frost damage received by 20% for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_BigswordIce_SSR_Level5_des: Targets hit by discharge skills take an additional 20% frost damage for the next 15 seconds.
